com.poesys.db.dto

Interface IDtoCache<T extends IDbDto>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of IDbDto to cache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DtoCache, DtoCacheWithMessaging, DtoMemcached

    public interface IDtoCache<T extends IDbDto>
    An interface for a cache of data transfer objects (DTOs); you can cache a DTO, get a DTO from the cache using its primary key, remove a DTO from the cache using its primary key, or clear the entire cache.
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cache(T object)
      Cache the object.
      void clear()
      Clear the cache, removing all cached objects of type T.
      T get(IPrimaryKey key)
      Get a cached object using a primary key.
      void remove(IPrimaryKey key)
      Remove a cached object using a primary key.
      void removeLocally(IPrimaryKey key)
      Remove a cached object from the cache using a primary key.

    • Method Detail

      • cache

        void cache(T object)
        Cache the object.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to cache

      • get

        T get(IPrimaryKey key)
        Get a cached object using a primary key. If the object is not cached, the method returns null.
        Parameters:
        key - the primary key for the object
        Returns:
        the object or null if the object is not cached

      • remove

        void remove(IPrimaryKey key)
        Remove a cached object using a primary key. If the object is not cached, the method does nothing. If messaging is enabled, the method requests that the object be removed from any remote caches. If distributed caching is used, the method removes the cached object from the distributed cache.
        Parameters:
        key - the key that identifies the object to remove

      • removeLocally

        void removeLocally(IPrimaryKey key)
        Remove a cached object from the cache using a primary key. If the object is not cached, the method does nothing. This method removes only a locally cached object and does not request removal of the object from remote caches. This method is for use in messaging-based caches, where receipt of a subscribed topic results in local removal.
        Parameters:
        key - the key that identifies the object to remove

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear the cache, removing all cached objects of type T. This leaves the cache itself but makes it empty. This method has no effect on a distributed cache that has no iteration or query API, such as memcached.
